about_the_game:
**UPDATE - This title is no longer being supported. It is still available for download for free for legacy purposes. Thanks! -Scott

Function World Gym is the future of gamified fitness!

From DocScott: I design exercises into the platform and I challenge YOU to beat my score. Can you beat me on the leaderboard? Can you take the top spot? Each month is a new season with added challenges. Season winners are added to the Hall of Heroes for everyone to see.

Features:
-An open season is running right now, race up the leaderboards before the winners are called. Then we add new challenges, wipe the scores and a new season begins.
-Gamified fitness when you want it, where you want it.
-Full body fitness including cardio, strength, balance, coordination, agility. Other fitness platforms just can't offer what Function does.
-Simple, gamified exercise mechanics.
-Constantly growing list of workouts.
-A supportive, growing community on Facebook and Discord (see links).
-Stream your favorite content (YouTube, Spotify, etc) in-game with you WHILE you exercise! Never be bored in a workout again!

Welcome to Function World Gym, the future of gamified fitness. Join now!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Room Scale 2.5m by 2.5m area required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
